title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

title: James Gunn on Creature Commandos’ Silhouetted Reveal of the New DCU’s Batman: ‘I’m Not Ready to Commit’
description: James Gunn was keeping his Bat-options open by having Max’s Creature Commandos — the animated series that official launched his and DC Studios co-CEO Peter Safran’s new DCU — always show Batman in silhouette. Commandos‘ Dark Knight (well, his impaled corpse) was first glimpsed in the fourth episode, as part of a future hellscape envisioned […]

description: Meghan Markle is throwing some glamorous dinner parties in the new year, and all Netflix subscribers are invited.
